long_description: Designed to keep you connected even on the go, the Osprey Cyber Port daypack secures your laptop and lets you use your tablet without removing it thanks to a clear, touch-sensitive tablet sleeve. Zippered main compartment features plenty of organizational panels and a fleece-lined, padded laptop sleeve; fits computers up to 15 in. Internal zippered tablet sleeve features a clear, touch-sensitive window that allows use of tablet from inside the sleeve. Small zippered top pocket is cloth-lined to protect sunglasses or electronics. Osprey Cyber Port daypack features durable polyester that resists tears and stands up well to daily use.
short_description: Designed to keep you connected even on the go, the Osprey Cyber Port daypack secures your laptop and lets you use your tablet without removing it thanks to a clear, touch-sensitive tablet sleeve.
